title: Smart Discharge Planning with Reinforcement Learning
description: Spearheaded a Developed a machine learning-based Q-learning model using heart rate, SpO2, and other metrics to recommend actions like discharge or ICU transfer, leveraging Scikit Learn for preprocessing and visualization.

title: Customer Support Chatbot
description: Built a customer support chatbot using 	extbf{NLP} techniques and a pre-trained LLM to understand and respond to customer queries, achieving around 75% accuracy in generating relevant responses.

title: Spartan MyComapnion
description: Developed a full-stack web application enabling SJSU students to post events, connect through chat rooms, vote, and reply to posts. Leveraged AWS services like DynamoDB, Lambda, Amplify, and S3 for scalable functionalities.

title: IOT Based Smart City using Image Processing
description: Pioneered the development of an IoT-based Smart City system integrating advanced Image Processing techniques, fostering efficient urban management and enhancing the overall quality of life.
